name: Ndung'u Kinyanjui
summary: AWS Certified Solutions Architect with a strong foundation in cloud computing, cybersecurity, and DevOps. Proven ability to drive impactful solutions at scale by delivering secure, cost-effective, and customer-focused AWS architectures. Seeking an opportunity at Amazon to innovate and contribute to building world-class cloud infrastructure.

Cloud Technologies: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, VPC, IAM, Lambda, CloudFormation, Route 53, CloudWatch)

experience.title: Cloud Engineering Intern
achievements: Reduced cloud spend by 15% by implementing cost-saving measures through optimized resource allocation
Delivered high-availability solutions using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform, minimizing manual intervention and increasing deployment speed by 40%
Enhanced cloud security by conducting in-depth audits and aligning environments with industry compliance standards

experience.title: GDG Cybersecurity Lead
achievements: Organized workshops and hackathons impacting over 200 students, focusing on Google technologies and cybersecurity best practices
Fostered awareness and adoption of Google Cloud tools for secure application development, leading to the successful completion of 10+ projects
Enhanced cybersecurity knowledge among participants, increasing engagement in technology-focused initiatives by 50%
Championed a cybersecurity culture, increasing student participation in cloud initiatives by 50%

experience.title: Student Developer
achievements: Designed and developed scalable software solutions, integrating robust frontend and backend components
Built and maintained RESTful APIs, enabling seamless communication between client and server-side applications
Conducted unit testing and debugging, ensuring software reliability and reducing defects by 30%
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software projects on time and within scope
Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving overall code quality

education.degree: Bachelor of Applied Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Scalable Web Application on AWS
projects.description: Architected a web application supporting 1,000+ concurrent users, integrating EC2 instances, RDS, and an ALB to ensure high performance and availability

projects.name: Cost-Efficient Storage Solution
projects.description: Reduced storage costs by 20% by implementing S3 lifecycle policies and optimizing data access patterns

projects.name: Automated Disaster Recovery
projects.description: Designed and implemented a recovery system using CloudFormation and S3 versioning, reducing downtime during outages by 80%

achievements: Increased application uptime by 99.9% through robust architectural designs
Delivered cloud security workshops to 200+ students, fostering adoption of secure practices
Reduced deployment times by 50% by introducing CI/CD pipelines across multiple projects
Enhanced infrastructure scalability, handling traffic spikes of up to 200% without performance degradation
